name: Re-Generate
description: Re-Generate is a premium supplement engineered to promote holistic recovery and regeneration. This innovative formula brings together the healing potential of BPC-157, the anti-inflammatory properties of PEA, and the skin and joint supporting effects of Hyaluronic Acid.
benefits: Tissue repair, inflammatory modulation, joint lubrication, skin hydration, and enhanced absorption/bioavailability.

name: Ultimate GI Repair
description: Ultimate GI Repair is an advanced gastrointestinal support formula that combines four bioactive peptides with potent gut-healing compounds aimed at promoting digestive health, maintaining intestinal integrity, and enhancing systemic recovery. Particularly beneficial for individuals seeking intensive support for gut health, inflammation reduction, and digestive comfort recovery.
benefits: Digestive health, intestinal integrity, healing, immune function, tissue repair, inflammation reduction, and digestive comfort.

name: Wolverine
description: Wolverine is a recovery and regeneration supplement combining peptides with synergistic naturals and bioavailability enhancers. Designed for individuals looking to accelerate their recovery. The formula combines BPC-157, TB4-Fragment, PEA, and absorption enhancers.
benefits: Healing, tissue repair, injury recovery, collagen synthesis, muscle recovery, anti-inflammatory and neuroprotective properties.

name: GHK-Cu
description: Liposomal GHK-Cu is a groundbreaking copper peptide formulation, crafted for superior absorption and systemic delivery. Housed in acid-resistant, delayed-release enteric-coated capsules to protect the peptide from stomach acid and digestive enzymes. Ideal for individuals focused on optimizing systemic recovery and skin quality.
benefits: Cellular repair, tissue regeneration, skin health, neuroprotective, anti-inflammatory, and analgesic properties.

name: Total Recomp
description: Total Recomp is a cutting-edge supplement formulated with 16 diverse ingredients aimed at supporting body composition and metabolism. Combines metabolic support compounds with experimental research compounds (DNF10, SLU-PP-332, T2) for comprehensive metabolic support.
benefits: Metabolic performance, energy production, blood glucose stabilization, fat oxidation, autophagy activation, and fat browning.

name: Neuro Regenerate
description: Support cognitive function, mental clarity, and neuroprotection with Neuro Regenerate, a cutting-edge Liposomal triple peptide formula. Combines three primary peptides with botanical support for cognitive longevity.
benefits: Neuroplasticity, memory, cognitive performance, BDNF boosting, cerebral blood flow, mitochondrial function, and cellular energy production.

name: AC Fragments (TB4-Frags)
description: AC Fragments (TB4-Frags) is a cutting-edge supplement designed to support muscle recovery and tissue repair. An oral formulation alternative to injectable peptides, delivering the same potential benefits in a convenient capsule form.
benefits: Muscle recovery, tissue regeneration, anti-inflammatory effects, neuroprotective properties, and enhanced bioavailability.

name: KPV
description: KPV is a dietary supplement designed to enhance systemic recovery and cellular health. The formulation combines the bioactive tripeptide KPV (Lysine, Proline, Valine) with complementary ingredients to deliver comprehensive support for recovery and well-being.
benefits: Immune modulation, tissue regeneration, inflammatory balance, tissue hydration, repair processes, and optimized peptide bioavailability.

name: Larazotide
description: Larazotide is a specialized product designed to enhance digestive health by supporting gut barrier functionality. Combines Larazotide with Quercetin, fermented Aloe Vera, and Sodium Bicarbonate to strengthen digestive function and overall wellness.
benefits: Gut barrier support, digestive health, anti-inflammatory, nutrient absorption, accelerated healing, and balanced immune responses.

name: Longevity (5-Amino-1MQ)
description: This formulation targets cellular health, metabolism, and longevity through a combination of advanced peptides and natural compounds. Works to boost NAD+ levels and inhibit the NNMT enzyme for comprehensive anti-aging support.
benefits: Energy metabolism, DNA repair, cellular senescence reduction, inflammation management, NAD+ boosting, and sirtuin activation.

name: Crevolution
description: Crevolution is a creatine-based supplement designed to enhance muscle performance, strength, and recovery through a multi-form creatine formula with enhanced absorption technology. Formulated for those aiming for elevated strength, muscle mass, and overall athletic performance enhancement.
benefits: Muscle performance, strength, recovery, enhanced creatine uptake, improved exercise resistance, and cognitive function.

name: Magnesium L-Threonate
description: Magnesium L-Threonate is a highly bioavailable form of magnesium that delivers this essential mineral in a unique compound formed with L-Threonate, a vitamin C metabolite. Designed for effective absorption and utilization throughout the body.
benefits: Muscle activity, nerve conduction, energy production, maintaining normal bone structure, and enhanced magnesium bioavailability.

name: PEA
description: Palmitoylethanolamide (PEA) is a naturally occurring fatty acid known for its potential role in alleviating pain and reducing inflammation. Works by interacting with the body's endocannabinoid system, which regulates pain and inflammatory responses.
benefits: Anti-inflammatory, pain management, neuroprotective support, brain health, cognitive function, cardiovascular support, and endocannabinoid system interaction.

name: GI Repair (BPC-Free)
description: Support gut health and intestinal integrity with GI Repair (BPC-Free), a comprehensive formula that combines peptides and gut-supporting compounds to promote digestive function and mucosal repair. Specifically designed without BPC-157, making it suitable for regions where that compound faces restrictions.
benefits: Gut barrier support, anti-inflammatory action, mucosal repair, digestive function optimization, and antioxidant balance.

name: Hista-Resist
description: Hista-Resist is a specialized supplement formulation designed to address histamine intolerance, food sensitivity reactions, and Mast Cell Activation Syndrome (MCAS). Aims to reduce excess histamine effects in the body.
benefits: Histamine degradation, mast cell stabilization, digestive support, enzyme effectiveness, and reduced histamine absorption.

name: TUDCA - 500mg
description: TUDCA 500mg is a bile salt known for its potential benefits in supporting liver function, bile flow, and cellular protection. A double-strength formula with 60 servings per bottle. Synthetic, vegan-friendly compound traditionally used in Chinese medicine.
benefits: Liver support, detoxification, neuroprotection, brain and eye health, and cellular protection.

name: Tributyrin Plus
description: Tributyrin Plus is a supplement formulated to support gut health and microbiome balance by combining tributyrin with synergistic probiotics. Tributyrin serves as a key energy source for enterocyte and colonocyte cells of the digestive tract.
benefits: Healthy gut lining, mucosal barrier support, digestive function, balanced intestinal microbiome, and anti-inflammatory properties.

name: TUDCA + Ox Bile
description: Support liver function and digestive health with TUDCA + Ox Bile, a synergistic combination designed to enhance bile flow, detoxification, and efficient fat digestion.
benefits: Healthy bile flow, liver cell protection, detoxification, fat breakdown, fat-soluble vitamin absorption, and digestive comfort.

name: Zinc Carnosine +
description: Zinc Carnosine + is crafted to enhance gut integrity and overall digestive health through a blend of Zinc L-Carnosine, Mastic Gum, and Deglycyrrhizinated Licorice (DGL). Supports skin health, immune defense, neurotransmitter regulation, and hormone production.
benefits: Gut integrity, digestive health, mucus production, stomach acid balance, skin health, immune defense, and hormone production.

name: TUDCA - 250mg
description: TUDCA (Tauroursodeoxycholic Acid) is a synthetic, vegan-friendly bile salt traditionally used in Chinese medicine to support liver function, bile flow, and cellular protection. 250mg per serving with 200mg of liver-supportive Taurine. A lower-dose option for sensitive individuals.
benefits: Liver health, detoxification, bile flow optimization, and cellular protection.

name: Botanabolic
description: Botanabolic is an advanced testosterone-supporting supplement designed to optimize hormone balance and enhance physical performance. Combines botanical and nutritional compounds targeting hormone support through the hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal axis.
benefits: Androgenic function, free testosterone levels, hormonal signaling (FSH/LH), muscle development, nitric oxide production, and myostatin inhibition.

name: Complete Liver Complex
description: Complete Liver Complex is a comprehensive supplement designed to enhance liver health and functionality by supporting the body's natural detoxification processes. Targets Phase 2 conjugation detoxification, Phase 3 bile production, and glutathione recycling.
benefits: Liver detoxification, glutathione conjugation, acetylation, amino acid conjugation, sulphation, methylation, glucuronidation, liver regeneration, and bile flow.

name: Turkesterone
description: Turkesterone is a plant-derived supplement extracted from Ajuga turkestanica, standardized to 20%, designed to support muscle growth, strength, and recovery. Non-hormonal (no PCT required), works through ERB2 receptor interaction. Includes hydroxypropyl-B-cyclodextrin complex for improved bioavailability.
benefits: Muscle growth, strength, recovery, muscle protein synthesis, stress management, and enhanced exercise capacity.

name: Dihydromyricetin (DHM)
description: Dihydromyricetin (DHM) is a flavonoid compound derived from the Ampelopsis grossedentata plant. Researched for its role in augmenting liver detoxification processes and antioxidant properties for cellular protection.
benefits: Liver detoxification, liver regeneration, alcohol metabolism support, antioxidant/cellular protection, cognitive wellness, and GABA receptor interaction.

name: BPC-157 Double Strength
description: BPC-157 Double Strength is a synergistic blend of advanced ingredients formulated to aid full-body healing and recovery. Contains 500 mcg of BPC-157 per capsule. Optimal for individuals needing targeted inflammation support and improved tissue regeneration.
benefits: Injury recovery, gastrointestinal health, collagen synthesis, inflammation management, and tissue regeneration.
